scripts.check: cd common && npx tsc --noEmit; cd ../backend && npx tsc --noEmit; cd ../frontend && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.dev: npm run init && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build:types: npm run build:types:common && npm run build:types:backend && npm run build:types:frontend
scripts.build:types:frontend: cd frontend && npx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && npx tsc -p tsconfig.node.json --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.install:workspaces: cd common && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run init
